title: Moderate: libcroco security update
description:
The libcroco is a standalone Cascading Style Sheet level 2 (CSS2) parsing and manipulation library. 
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

references.title: Update information for CVE-2020-12825 is retrieved from Red Hat
